description:
=================================================================

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/QJRHhuUYsM

SM-DLM:
https://github.com/QuestionableM/SM-CustomAudioExtension#readme

=================================================================

This mod adds new spudguns. They look like famous guns from WW1 and WW2.
Some of them are animated so check them out if you like that kind of details!

=================================================================

{value} - delay after shoot in ticks
[A] - gun is animated
<value> - amount of ammo in the magazine

====== NEW CONTENT ======

- StG 44
- S&W Model 10 Revolver
- Stielhandgranate 24 (single)
- Combat Knife
- Panzerfaust
- Pump Shotgun

+ PTRD Buff


===== HANDHELD GUNS =====

- PTRD rifle
- P38 Walter
- M1911 Colt
- Thompson SMG
- Mp-40 SMG
- PPSh 41 [box] SMG
- PPSh 41 [drum] SMG
- Mosin Rifle (scoped)
- M1 Garand Rifle
- M20 Bazooka
- AT Grenade Boundle
- Frag Grenade
- Eoka
- Double Barrel Shotgun 
- Magnum Revolver


=== LIGHT MACHINE GUNS ===

- [A] Lewis M1914  {4}
- [A] Maxim M1905  {4}
- Mac-31 [A] <150> {3}
- M1919 .30 {3}
- MG-34 {3}
- [A] MG-42 {2}, <50>
- DP-29 {4}
- DGx03 {4}

=== HEAVY MACHINE GUNS ===

- [A] Browning .50 {4}
- [A] Browning .50 Aircraft {4}
- DSzK 12.7mm {4}

====== 20mm CANNONS ======

- MG 151/20 {8}
- WZ.38 {10}
- Hispano {10}
- [A] Vulcan M61 {4}

======= EXPLOSIVES ========

- Bomb (proximity fuse)
- Bomb 50kg
- Bomb 100kg
- Bomb 250kg
- Anti-Tank Mine
- S-Mine

===== OTHER WEAPONS ======

- Bazooka {120}
- AK-47 {5}
- [A] Mosin-Nagant 1891 {100} <5>
- [A] PTRD-41 {120}
- [A] Cannon {160}

===========================


--------------------------Credit & Copyright:----------------------------
Brent Batch / DO NOT COPY without permission from 
Brent Batchdiscord)
Question Mark - scripts explosive and non-explosive guns
"Alarmblock" script is made by wingcomstriker405
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
name: Machine gun
